schoolname: Specialized Institute of Applied Technology Management Bab Tizimi
Description: The Skilled Technician in Software Development is a support professional development and maintenance of computer applications.

schoolname: high school degree in physical and chemical sciences, Moulay Ismail High School
Description: During the 3 years of my studying in high school helped me learn a lot and gave me a correct way to build my career, as an IT Developer.

Due to the bad quality of the Moroccan educational system, I had to educate myself on the basics of Python, web development along the latest technology tools used to build web apps using Python Frameworks ex. Flask, Django, FastAPI.
